picked_headlines.summary: Semantic Pyramid Indexing boosts RAG systems' speed in VecDBs.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article presents a significant advancement in database technology, impacting both engineering and management by improving data retrieval efficiency.

picked_headlines.summary: Syd: Offline AI workstation for secure malware analysis.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This product-focused article is crucial for cybersecurity stakeholders, offering a new tool for secure offline malware analysis, relevant to both technical teams and management.

digest:
- *KRAL* enhances LLMs for clinical antimicrobial therapy, reducing costs and manual data annotation. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.15974)
- *UI-CUBE* benchmarks CUAs for operational reliability, highlighting significant gaps in complex workflows. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.17131)
- *Bench360* simplifies benchmarking local LLM inference, integrating metrics for optimal performance. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.16682)
- *E$^3$-Pruner* proposes a novel framework for efficient layer pruning in large language models. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.17205)
- *ReviewGuard* enhances deficient peer review detection via LLM-driven data augmentation. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.16549)
- *OmniGround* introduces a new benchmark for spatio-temporal video grounding, addressing model limitations. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.16937)
- *FLUID* offers a training-free method for face de-identification using latent space identity substitution. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.17005)
- *AraFinNews* introduces a large Arabic financial news dataset, enhancing summarisation with domain-adapted LLMs. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.01265)
- *MF-GCN* introduces a novel approach for tri-modal depression detection using eye-tracking, audio, and video. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.15675)
